parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of a specific piece of content.

parameters.name: annotations
parameters.description: List of annotations that describe the data to be output.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The ID of a specific piece of content.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The beginning of the schedule period. Can be an ISO date, number of seconds since 1 Jan 1970 or a relative duration, e.g. 'now'.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end of the schedule period. Can be an ISO date, number of seconds since 1 Jan 1970 or a relative duration., e.g. 'now.plus.6h'.

parameters.name: annotations
parameters.description: List of annotations that describe the data to be output.
